pages.text: 69|35|dau che  neah  kmean mi td phokde na chuoy ke laey now thngainih(thngai  barlok) .
69|36|haeyka kmean chamneiahar na krawpi khtohchheam .
69|37|del kmean anaknea sai vea  krawpi puok br pru td babakamm laey .
69|38|yeung sbath nung avei del puok anak kheunh
69|39|ning avei del puok anak minkheunh tha
69|40|pitabrakd nasa  vea( kompir kuor an)  pitchea peakyapech  robsa a l laoh del sautr daoy anakneasar da mha thkomthkaeng .
69|41|haey vea minmen chea peakyapech robsa anak kvi laey .  te avei del puok anak chue noh ku techtuoch bamphot .
69|42|haeyka minmen chea peakyapech robsa krouteay der .  te avei  del puok anak nukkheunh noh ku techtuoch bamphot .
69|43|kompir kuor an kuchea kar banhchouh mk pi mcheasa krobkrong nei piphp  teangoasa .
69|44|haey brasenbae ke( mou ham meat) banthem banthoy peakyasaamdei  khleah leu peakyasaamdei robsa yeung noh
69|45|yeung nung phdantatosa ke daoy daisdam robsa yeung
69|46|banteabmk yeung pitchea nung kat sarsaichham behdaung robsa  ke cheaminkhan .
69|47|haey kmean anaknea mneak knongchamnaom puok anak ach reareang vea ( kar daktosa robsa yeung) ban laey .
69|48|haey pitabrakd nasa vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea kar romluk  dl banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh .
69|49|haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung doeng tha  knongchamnaom puok anak  pitchea mean anak del bdeseth( nung kompir kuor an) .
69|50|haey pit bra dk nasa  vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea kar saok  sday yeang khlang champoh puok del kmean chomnue( now thngai barlok) .
69|51|haey pitabrakd nasa vea kuchea karpit yeang cheaksdeng .
69|52|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung neam nei mcheasa robsa  anak da mha utdongk utdam .
70|1|anak som mneak( anak kmean chomnue) ban buongsuong som aoy tearounakamm  kaetlaeng
70|2|champoh puok del kmean chomnue .  kmean anaknea mneak ach karpar ke
70|3|pi( tearounakamm) a l laoh del chea mcheasa nei phlauv laeng towleu  mekh
70|4|del mea la ai kat  ning chi pri l laeng towkean trong knong muoy  thngai del rypel robsa vea chamnuon haseb pean chhnam laey .
70|5|dau che  neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) atthmot nouv kar atthmot muoy  da la choh .
70|6|pitabrakd nasa  puokke( puok kmean chomnue) kheunh tearounakamm  now chhngay bamphot .
70|7|te yeung kheunh vea now chitabangkeuy .
70|8|now thngai del mekh nung klay dauchchea lohtheato kampoung rleay .
70|9|haey phnom ka klay dauchchea romosatv baeng prongopreat .
70|10|( now thngai noh) kmean mi td ph ke  d na suorsokhtoukkh mi td ph ke  dna  laey
